text: John Charles Sime (3 August 1871 – 16 June 1961) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Charlie Sime's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1871 births Category:1961 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Charlie Sime
